quoted_tweet.text:
NEW: Bill Maher says Democrats didn’t just flirt with woke—they married it, and now it’s dragging the whole party off a cliff.

Maher just dropped a brutal reality check: if Democrats don’t cut ties with the woke cult, they’re finished.

“You get a certain amount of cult followers for anything and then the true believers never die.”

And if the party doesn’t break free?

“A lot of people would say right now the Democratic Party is still in that mode, which is going to render them, possibly, an irrelevant party if they don't change.”

His solution?

“Much more centrism—get rid of the woke baggage, you know? Old school liberal is what I usually describe myself as,” he said.

But don’t confuse that with today’s woke ideology.

“Woke would like people to believe that they're some sort of an extension of liberalism, but they're not.”

“They're usually something that's quite opposite.”

Then Maher dropped the hammer:

“Liberalism was, we should have a colorblind society and not see race at all. That’s not what the woke believe. They’re the opposite. Put race at the front of everything.”

Bill is the canary in the coal mine: if Democrats don’t drop the dead weight, they won’t just lose power—they’ll cease to exist.

Young men should be angry. The long-term effect of taking Adderall and Ritalin over years is growth suppression. 

I don’t think many boys are told “take this pill, and the major side effect is you’ll be shorter.”

Terrible.

tweets.text: @AutismCapital I was thinking of posting video logs

Important to note that what matters is the ability to refine rare earth elements (which are NOT actually meaningfully rare) and manufacture magnets for use in electric motors. 

People understandably tend to think that rare earth mineral deposits are what’s scarce, given the name. That is false. They’re everywhere.

As with lithium, what China has that others lack is the heavy industry of refining the minerals.
